attributes.action: Remove the Hereditary Title of Lord Monckton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
He has been rather too successful in deception campaigns against Global Warming. We believe he embarrasses the country and actively undermines our national objectives. 

And that his title compounds this embarrassment.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the monarch.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
